original_title: The Poetry Deal: A Film with Diane di Prima
overview: The Poetry Deal: a film with Diane di Prima is an impressionistic documentary and a story about poetry, rebellion, and artistic integrity. Poet, prose writer, playwright, teacher, mother, and revolutionary activist Diane di Prima started writing at the age of seven. She ultimately became known as an important writer of the Beat movement. This lyrical and energetic film explores her life and work in a visually and narratively poetic film with rare intimate interviews.
title: The Poetry Deal: A Film with Diane di Prima
